alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Greene; Eastern Rensselaer; Eastern Schenectady; Northern Saratoga; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington; Western Albany; Western Columbia; Western Greene; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 11:50PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALL... HAZARDS...A snow squall which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1149 PM EDT, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Saratoga Springs to near Preston-Potter Hollow and moving southeast at 35 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Saratoga Springs around 1155 PM EDT. Round Lake around 1200 AM EDT. Mechanicville around 1210 AM EDT. Cambridge and Athens around 1230 AM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 25. Interstate 890 between exits 8 and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 21B and 7, and between exits 8A and 12, and near exit 14. Interstate 787 between exits 1 and 9. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
